verse.name: c1
verse.lines: At the cross, at the cross, newline Where I first saw the light newline And the burden of my heart rolled away; newline It was there by faith, I received my sight newline And now I am happy all the day!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Alas and did my Savior bleed, newline And did my sov'reign die? newline Would He devote that sacred head, newline For such a worm as I?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Was it for crimes that I have done, newline He groaned upon the tree? newline Amazing pity grace unknown, newline And love beyond degree!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Well might the sun in darkness hide, newline And shut His glories in; newline When Christ the mighty Maker died, newline For man the creature's sin.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: But drops of grief can ne'er repay, newline The debt of love I owe; newline Here, Lord, I give myself to Thee, newline 'Tis all that I can do!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Thus might I hide my blushing face newline While Calvary's cross appears, newline Dissolve my heart in thankfulness, newline And melt mine eyes to tears.
